## What is process mapping?

* Can be undertaking in very elaborate and complicated fashion.
* However, at its core, you draw a flow chart that describes a process, either current, or a new imagined one.

![](/media/toothbrush-process-map.png){fig-align="center" width="max" height="max"}


## Why do process mapping?

* We may be asked to process a lot when we are transforming processes and a lot of the time we do not see them used to good affect.
* However, if you use it prior to jumping into a project, it is a good tool to think about the problem, help explain the current issues and your view on a new process pathway, and also it gives you a step by step guide to building your new digital app.


## Where do process mapping? {background-image="/media/fibre-optics.jpg" background-opacity="0.3"}

* You can do this on paper
* Today, we will be using an online process mapping program


## Let's do process mapping {background-image="/media/skier-in-mid-air.jpg" background-opacity="0.3"}

* Go join your break out group. 
* Once there you will be given a link to an online process mapping program called `Moqups`.


## Specifically

* Choose one person in your group to create your process map.
* Spend 10 minutes in your group to create a process map of current paper based consent forms.
* Then spend another 10 minutes to think of the best digital consent form you would want and create a process map to describe how it would work.
* We will then reconvene at half past and talk through your results.
